results.description: Combine short-term idiosyncratic momentum with recent specific return to capture continuation in stock-specific moves. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two datafields (daily_specific_return, rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). Coverage for both =1.0 so SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill not needed. Chose high userCount fields (daily_specific_return userCount=22, momentum userCount=109) per SUGGESTION4. Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits (KEEP_IN_MINDs). Confidence set to 0.65 based on empirical persistence of idiosyncratic momentum.

Long stocks with rising hedge-fund ownership percent but small market cap adjusted to avoid size bias. Used two datafields (hedge_fund_ownership_percent, current_market_cap_usd) per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields (SUGGESTION2). Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Both fields have high userCount (119 and 15) so SUGGESTION4 applied. Kept operators minimal and under limits. Confidence 0.6 due to crowding risks and size effects.

Short-interest high stocks with recent positive specific returns tend to mean-revert. Used short_interest_factor_score and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Both coverage=1 so no ts_backfill needed. Used high userCount short interest (33) and daily specific return (22) per SUGGESTION4. Implementation limited to few operators (KEEP_IN_MINDs). Confidence 0.58 reflecting moderate historical performance.

Short stocks with high residual volatility (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol) scaled by specific risk variance to control dispersion. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. No vectors. Coverage high so no ts_backfill. Both fields have decent userCount (209, 7). Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.62 due to persistent risk premium for low residual vol.

results.idea: Earnings-yield plus low leverage value trade
results.description: Long stocks with high earnings yield (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild) and low leverage (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_leverage) to capture value with balance sheet safety. SUGGESTION1 used both fields. Coverage ~1 so no backfill. Both have high userCount (365, 214) per SUGGESTION4. Kept within operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.7 given classic value-size robustness.

Exploit short-term reversal by sign flip of 1-day reversal factor rsk70_mfm2_usfast_1drevrsl with ts_zscore smoothing. Used single high-coverage field (SUGGESTION1 single accepted). No vector fields. Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. rsk70_1drevrsl has huge userCount (972) so SUGGESTION4 applied. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.66 due to strong short-term reversal evidence.

Favor high dividend-yield loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild) stocks that also show rising momentum to capture yield+momo. Applied SUGGESTION1 with two fields if combining with momentum; here use dividend yield and momentum. Both coverages high, no ts_backfill. Used high userCount dividendYield (573) and momentum (109) per SUGGESTION4. Operators limited. Confidence 0.61 reflecting mixed evidence for combining yield and momentum.

Short stocks with extreme hedge_fund_ownership_percent after recent ts_delta in ownership suggests crowding. Use hedge_fund_ownership_percent and ts_delta of that percent. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1 so ts_backfill not used. Hedge fund fields have very high userCount (119). Kept operators within limits. Confidence 0.55 since ownership data updates infrequently.

Long momentum but neutralize exposure to market factor (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market) to keep pure alpha. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Both have solid userCount (109 and 128). Kept operations simple. Confidence 0.63 as neutrality reduces factor drag.

Target small-cap stocks where short interest declines while momentum improves. Uses short_interest_factor_score and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverage=1; no ts_backfill. Short interest userCount=33, market cap userCount=15 satisfying SUGGESTION4. Implementation concise and within limits. Confidence 0.56 given mixed microcap liquidity.

Long stocks with low specific risk (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri proxy via specret field) and high management quality (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty). Uses two fields. Applied SUGGESTION1 and selected higher userCount fields (mgmtqlty userCount=156). Coverage ~0.88 for mgmtqlty but >0.6 so no ts_backfill. Kept simple. Confidence 0.64 for quality factor persistence.

Exploit long-term reversal (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_ltrevrsl) strongest in small caps; scale by inverse size. Used long-term reversal and current_market_cap_usd (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Both have good userCounts (124,15). Keep operators minimal. Confidence 0.6 based on historical reversal literature.

Favor stocks with rising earnings-quality loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty) and improving prospect-specific returns. Uses earnqlty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily (SUGGESTION1). earnqlty coverage 0.9512 (>0.6) so no ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Applied SUGGESTION4 by using moderately high userCounts. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.59 reflecting data coverage caveat.

Long industries with rising industry exposure (e.g., semiconductors_exposure_score) and short declining industries (e.g., airlines_exposure_score). Use two exposures at a time (SUGGESTION1). No vectors. Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. Chose fields with nonzero userCount. Kept operators under limits. Confidence 0.52 since sector timing is noisy.

Long stocks that combine high momentum (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum) but low specific risk (specific_risk_value_2) to improve risk-adjusted returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverage high so no backfill. UserCounts solid. Kept ops minimal. Confidence 0.67 due to improvement in Sharpe when avoiding high idiosyncratic risk.

Short stocks with high hedge_fund_ownership_percent and high specific_risk_variance to capture crowding + poor risk profile. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1 so no backfill. Hedge fund userCount high. Operators few. Confidence 0.54 noting crowding unwinds risk.

Exploit momentum while removing sentiment-heavy stocks by subtracting sentiment loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt) from momentum. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Both cover high; no ts_backfill. Sentiment userCount high (603). Kept operators simple. Confidence 0.6 since sentiment can be noisy.

Long high profit style loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit) and short low profit to capture profit premium. Single field used via quantile ranking (SUGGESTION1 minimal). Coverage 0.9756 (>0.6) so no backfill. UserCount high (288). Implementation compact. Confidence 0.68 as profit has stable premium.

Mean-revert extreme residual volatility (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol) by shorting recent spikes measured by ts_zscore. Single field used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage=1; no ts_backfill. UserCount 209. Operators limited. Confidence 0.57 due to episodic behavior.

Short stocks where short interest rises and momentum is negative: combine short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Both userCounts moderate/high. Implementation uses subtract and multiply. Confidence 0.55 because signals can be offset by squeezes.

Long stocks with high earnings yield and low market beta (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_beta). SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Both fields have good userCount. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.65 due to classic value-beta interaction.

results.idea: Prospect momentum x low specific risk
results.description: Long names with high prospect_specret_daily and low specific_risk_uncertainty to capture reliable positive surprises. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage=1 so no backfill. UserCounts solid. Implementation simple. Confidence 0.62 given earnings surprise persistence.

Reverse extreme daily specific returns measured by ts_zscore of rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi. Single high-coverage field used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. UserCount high (302). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.6 due to short-term mean reversion evidence.

Short high hedge fund ownership in high dividend-yield names to capture overpricing from yield-chasing funds. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; no backfill. High userCounts. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.53 as dividend chasing can persist.

Rank firms by recent ts_returns and then weight by industry exposure like semiconductors_exposure_score to capture industry-specific momentum. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). No vectors; coverage=1. UserCounts adequate. Kept operators limited. Confidence 0.59 because industry momentum can amplify returns.

results.idea: Low specific risk + high management quality
results.description: Long names with low specific_risk_value_2 and high mgmt quality (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty). Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). mgmtqlty coverage 0.8817 (>0.6) so no backfill. Both userCounts reasonable. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.63 for stability premium.

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by residual risk
results.description: Exploit short-term reversals in daily_specific_return but reduce exposure where residual volatility is high: use daily_specific_return and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Operators limited. Confidence 0.56 given balancing of signals.

Long names with positive recent prospect_specret_monthly and rising regional momentum (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_regmom). Two fields used. Coverage=1 so ts_backfill not needed. UserCounts decent. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.58 given monthly horizon.

Long high value loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value) but penalize by downrisk (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_dwnrisk) to avoid value traps. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Both userCounts solid. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.66 since value with lower downside shows stronger returns.

Capture momentum but normalize by size to avoid cap-weight bias: rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum / current_market_cap_usd. Two fields used. Coverage high so no backfill. UserCounts good. Implementation short and within limits. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short names with rising specific risk uncertainty
results.description: Short stocks where specific_risk_uncertainty increases and recent specific return is negative. Uses specific_risk_uncertainty and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. UserCounts modest. Operators few. Confidence 0.50 because this can be noisy.

Long names with positive prospect_specret_daily while short the negative tail. Single main field used with quantile ranking for a long-short implementation (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1, userCount high (253). Operators minimal. Confidence 0.61 given persistence of prospect surprises.

Short-interest spikes often revert; take reverse of ts_zscore(short_interest_factor_score). Single field used. Coverage=1, no ts_backfill. UserCount 33. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.52 due to occasional squeezes.

results.idea: Earnings-yield x low leverage value long
results.description: Enhance value by requiring high earnings yield and low leverage: combine rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_leverage (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Operators few. Confidence 0.68 consistent with value/quality tradeoffs.

Construct momentum but subtract market loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market) to be market-neutral. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Appropriate userCounts. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.63.

Long names with moderate hedge_fund_ownership_percent but low specific_risk_variance to capture stable fund-backed companies. Two fields used. Coverage high; no backfill. Hedge fund userCount very high. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57 given mixed evidence.

Short stocks with high sentiment loading and negative momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum (SUGGESTION1). Both coverage=1; sentiment userCount large. Operators limited. Confidence 0.55 because sentiment can lag.

Within semiconductor-exposed firms, favor those with positive recent specific return. Uses semiconductors_exposure_score and daily_specific_return (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1 so no backfill. semiconductors userCount=6. Kept operators simple. Confidence 0.56 due to sector cyclicality.

Long restaurant_industry_exposure_score names with low downrisk (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_dwnrisk) to target resilient consumer services. Two fields used. Coverage=1; no ts_backfill. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.53 due to consumer cyclicality.

results.idea: Short-run momentum fade in net retail
results.description: Short net_retail_exposure_score names with extreme short-term momentum reversals measured by ts_zscore of daily_specific_return. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; no backfill. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.51 as retail moves can be volatile.
Prefer value (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value) but penalize high leverage (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_leverage). Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short names with high specific risk and low profit
results.description: Short combination of high specific_risk_variance and low profit loading to avoid low-quality risky firms. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage=1; userCounts good. Operators limited. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by short interest decline
results.description: Favor momentum leaders where short interest is falling (ts_delta short_interest_factor_score negative). Uses short_interest_factor_score and momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; userCounts robust. Operators kept few. Confidence 0.57.

Long stocks with high earnings quality (earnqlty) and high growth loading (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_growth). Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. earnqlty coverage 0.9512 (>0.6) so no backfill. Both userCounts decent. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.65.

Short names with both high residual volatility and high short interest, capturing risky, heavily bet names. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; userCounts adequate. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.56.

Reverse extreme monthly prospect-specific returns via reverse(ts_zscore) on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_monthly. Single field used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; userCount 195. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.54 as monthly reversals can be noisy.

Long names with high dividend yield loading and low residual volatility to capture yield with lower drawdown. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. Coverage high. UserCounts good. Operators under limits. Confidence 0.60.

Go long when ts_arg_max(daily_specific_return,5)=0 indicating current is 5-day max; short otherwise. Uses single field daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Coverage=1; userCount 22. Uses ts_arg_max operator which is in list. Confidence 0.58.

Favor industry-exposed stocks (e.g., building_products_exposure_score) that also have high earnings-quality (earnqlty). Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). earnqlty coverage 0.9512; no ts_backfill. Chosen fields have moderate userCounts. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by specific risk uncertainty
results.description: Scale momentum signal by inverse of specific_risk_uncertainty to favor more certain momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_uncertainty (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; userCounts robust. Operators within limits. Confidence 0.61.

Apply short-term reversal to daily_specific_return but only for high hedge_fund_ownership_percent names. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; hedge fund field userCount high. Use trade_when-like filter via multiply and quantile thresholding. Kept operators simple. Confidence 0.53.
Rank by short_interest_factor_score but neutralize by size using divide by current_market_cap_usd. Two fields used. Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57.

Favor value loading but penalize names with volatile specific returns (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi variance proxy). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages=~1; no backfill. Operators concise. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum trimmed by specific risk variance
results.description: Trim momentum signal where specific_risk_variance is high to avoid idiosyncratic blowups. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Coverage=1; userCounts adequate. Implementation uses divide. Confidence 0.60.

Combine low short interest and high profit loading to find safe long exposures. Uses short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; userCounts solid. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Trade on sudden drops in hedge-fund ownership
results.description: Buy names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent has large negative ts_delta indicating potential forced selling and mean-reversion. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent with ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; hedge fund userCount high. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.52.

Classic combining high value (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value) and positive momentum to capture complementary premiums. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; userCounts large. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.69 as combo is robust historically.

results.idea: Low residual vol x high management quality
results.description: Long low residual volatility with high management quality to tilt toward stable, well-run firms. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high; userCounts adequate. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short high-specific-return outliers in small caps
results.description: Short tiny caps with extreme positive daily_specific_return (potential pump) using current_market_cap_usd and daily_specific_return. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; userCounts reasonable. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.48 due to noisy small-cap signals.

Favor high earnings yield but penalize if prospect_specret_monthly is negative to avoid deteriorating prospects. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_monthly. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage high. Operators within limits. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short names with high specific risk uncertainty and low profit
results.description: Combine specific_risk_uncertainty and reverse profit loading to short dubious low-profit risky firms. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ok. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low hedge-fund ownership
results.description: Give more weight to momentum signals in stocks with low hedge fund ownership to avoid crowding. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Operators limited. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short extreme sentiment names with weak profit
results.description: Short names with very high sentiment loading but low profit to capture fashionable poor-quality firms. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; userCounts large. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.54.

Rank sectors by average ts_returns (approx via specific returns weighted by exposure like automotive exposure) to capture sector rotation. Uses automobiles_exposure_score and ts_returns(daily_specific_return,20). Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1. Operators within limits. Confidence 0.50 because sector timing is challenging.

results.idea: High short interest x jump in residual vol
results.description: Short names where short interest is high and residual volatility spikes; uses short_interest_factor_score and ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol). Two fields used. Coverage=1; ops minimal. Confidence 0.53.

Long stocks with momentum but negative prospect_specret_monthly may indicate mispricing; combine momentum and prospect fields to detect divergence. Two fields used. Coverage high. Operators simple. Confidence 0.49 as this is speculative.

Buy when daily_specific_return is ts_arg_min over 5 days (extreme short-term loser) expecting bounce. Single field used. Coverage=1. Uses ts_arg_min operator. Implementation short and compliant. Confidence 0.56.
Long wireless_communications_exposure_score names with low specific risk variance to favor stable telecoms. Two fields used. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.52.

Long stocks where hedge_fund_ownership_percent ts_delta is strongly negative (selling) anticipating a rebound. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent with ts_zscore(ts_delta). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1; high userCount. Operators few. Confidence 0.51.

Long high value loading but penalize high sentiment to avoid momentum bubbles. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short names with rising prospect specret and negative momentum
results.description: Short names where prospect_specret_daily rises but momentum is negative (possible short-squeeze rumor). Uses prospect_specret_daily and momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.46 due to speculative nature.

Long high dividend yield and low residual volatility names to capture defensive income returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage high. Operators few. Confidence 0.60.

Short names with high short interest and negative prospect_specret_monthly as they may be structurally weak. Uses short_interest_factor_score and prospect_specret_monthly. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.52.

Within biotech exposure (biotechnology_life_sciences_exposure_score) favor names with momentum but low specific risk to avoid binary risk. Uses two fields. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.54.

Prefer value names with low hedge-fund ownership to avoid crowded value trades. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and hedge_fund_ownership_percent (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1. Operators simple. Confidence 0.59.
Short names showing extreme positive daily_specific_return spikes (ts_zscore) which often mean-revert. Single field used. Coverage=1; userCount 22. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.53.
Long positive prospect_specret_daily but hedge by market loading rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market to reduce market exposure. Uses two fields. Coverage=1. Operators limited. Confidence 0.60.
Combine low short_interest_factor_score and low rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol for defensive longs. Two fields used. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by specific risk variance threshold
results.description: Apply momentum only if specific_risk_variance below threshold by multiplying momentum with inverse variance. Two fields used. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short extreme hedge-fund crowded speculative names
results.description: Short names with very high hedge_fund_ownership_percent and low profit to target crowded low-quality equities. Two fields used. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.52.

Use winsorized daily_specific_return ts_zscore to reduce outlier influence, then apply momentum ranking. Single datafield used with winsorize and ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 minimal; no backfill needed. Keeps ops low. Confidence 0.61.

Long names with high management quality and decent dividend yield loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_divyild (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high; no backfill. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.57.
Short midcap stocks (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_midcap) with high residual volatility to capture risk premium. Uses midcap and resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage=1. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.50.

Long stocks with high earnqlty but low sentiment to avoid frothy names. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. earnqlty coverage 0.9512 but >0.6 so no ts_backfill. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short-term reversal in 1-day reversal within industries
results.description: Use rsk70_mfm2_usfast_1drevrsl reversed to capture one-day mean reversion, optionally weighted by industry exposure; here single field used for simplicity (SUGGESTION1). Coverage=1; userCount very high. Operators minimal. Confidence 0.64.
